author: Jennifer Ouellette
title: Teaser for NBC Peacock’s Brave New World brings Huxley’s vision to life
description: "We're at the beginning of something. Something necessary."
content:
1 with 1 posters participating
Alden Ehrenreich stars as antihero John the Savage in NBC Peacock's forthcoming series Brave New World, an adaptation of Aldous Huxley's seminal dystopian novel.
NBC's Peacock streaming service marked this week's "soft launch"… [+5693 chars]
